text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
It was a splendid run. I felt so
impassioned just cheering you on!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Yes! The fans' expectations are the
power to run… on the big stage, to the
top.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I'm sure you will find glory!
